item.title: No more tests, homework, tutoring for Chinese students
item.description:
China Enters “Testing-free” Zone: The New Ten Commandments of Education Reform writes:

No standardized tests, no written homework, no tracking. These are some of the new actions China is taking to lessen student academic burden. The Chinese Ministry of Education released Ten Regulations to Lessen Academic Burden for Primary School …
